europeana:record.dc:title: Four new species of the genus Conspinaria Schulz (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Rogadinae) from Vietnam
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Long K.D.
Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae
Rogadinae
Conspinaria
new species
Vietnam
europeana:record.dc:description: Four new species of the genus Conspinaria Schulz (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Rogadinae) from Vietnam are described and illustrated: C. huongsonensis Long & van Achterberg, spec. nov., C. pumatica Long & van Achterberg, spec. nov., C. nigroapicalis Long & van Achterberg, spec. nov. and C. similis Long & van Achterberg, spec. nov. A key to the species of the genus Conspinaria from Vietnam is included.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Four new species of the genus Conspinaria Schulz (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Rogadinae) from Vietnam (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 82) (Issue 31)
